summary: About the Swedish author Agnes Von Krusenstjerna (1894-1940), during her turbulent marriage with David Sprengel. In a hallucination Agnes is brought to a mental hospital in Venice, carrying her fictitious autobiography.
cast: Stina Ekblad|Erland Josephson|Philip Zandén|Lena T. Hansson|Peter Schildt|Catherine de Seynes|Olof Thunberg|Börje Ahlstedt|Inga Gill|Gösta Krantz|Anita Björk|Heinz Hopf|Anja Landgré|Mimi Pollak|Gunnel Broström|Lauritz Falk|Johan Rabaeus|Rico Rönnbäck|Margreth Weivers|Henrik Schildt|Nils Eklund|Eva von Hanno|Seija Hyvönen-Mammen|Gustav Kling|Sten Lonnert|Allan Svensson|Efva Lilja|Helene Friberg|Karin Forslind|Inga Landgré|Hanna Wanngård|Lindis Sundström|Lilian Brage|Leif Göras|Lars-Olof Larsson|Per Gudmunsson|Anneli Martini|Johan Schildt|Ulf von Zweigbergk|Tomas Laustiola|Bo Rhenberg|Peter Gröning|Ulf Montan|Paul Kessel|Bissa Abelli|Anna-Karin Blomqvist|Curt Hilfon|John Zacharias|Efisio Coletti|Carlo Barsotti|Federico Caprara|Lamberto Caprara|Lennart Järnstad
title: Amorosa
